items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s No-Shine is our best bet tape for all hair extensions.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s No-Shine is our best bet tape for all hair extensions. It’s made to be dull, comfortable, and hypoallergenic. No-Shine is our most popular extension tape that gives a comfortable wear experience.

All Beautify™ tapes will last 4-6 weeks depending on installation and care. Actual performance varies on body chemistry, climate, etc.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely.

With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.outofstockmessage: No-Shine is currently out of stock.
items.displayname: Beautify - No Shine - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - No Shine - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll
items.storedescription:
Rolls:

Peel the No Shine tape from the roll and cut to desired length. Avoid touching the adhesive.
Place the cut piece of No Shine onto the extension weft.
Repeat as needed.
When you are ready to apply the extensions, peel off the liner and install it to the hair.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - No Shine - 1/3" X 6 Yds, Roll | Walker Tape
